title: New: Teengirl Fantasy – Motif
body:
So it’s been blogged about pretty much everywhere today, but _Motif_, this new track from trip-pop duo **Teengirl Fantasy** kills it.

Gradually unfurling over it’s seven minute length, with broad synth sections and stunning percussion fading in and out, it’s the best non-drug-induced trip you’ll ever have. _Motif_ is released on 25 June via R&S Records, check it out below.

Gradually unfurling over it’s seven minute length, with broad synth sections and stunning percussion fading in and out, it’s the best non-drug-induced trip you’ll ever have. Motif is released on 25 June via R&S \[…\]
